enhanced_by.reason: The fixedString method relies on the sentence method to generate sentences, which are then used to build the fixed-length string.
The fixedString method can be influenced by the sentence method with a specified word count, which affects the length of the generated sentences.
Both fixedString and maxLengthSentence methods generate strings with a fixed length, making them suitable for similar assertions.
The characters method also generates strings of a specified length, which can be used to compare outputs with fixedString for validation.
